body_html: @zou3519 , I made a minimal reproducible example. But I am not getting that much difference in the minimal example, while I am still getting the difference in my main code. For data to be used in the minimal example, I am just saving the tensor from my main code and loading it in the minimal example. So the only difference seems to be in the data loading. I haven't figured out if and where I am making mistake in my main code. So, I am closing this. Thank you very much for the support.
